column4: How do you execute a command and have it execute from another /dev/pts/# ?  i.e. execute clear from /dev/pts/2 but executes on /dev/pts/3
thanks, but clear doesn't accept any other arguments.  I've got the redirect output from one pts to another figured out.  but now I'd like to have a command execute from a different /dev/pts. :)
I don't understand what you mean
